title: Ticket still has incorrect file paths - no resolution provided
issue:
This is a continuation attempt, but the ticket (v1) still specifies the same incorrect file paths that were reported as blockers in the previous attempt on 2025-12-11. The ticket has not been updated with correct file paths.

Previously identified issues (still present):
1. `apps/dashboard/src/app/api/agents/invite/route.ts` - DOES NOT EXIST
2. `packages/database/src/schema.ts` - DOES NOT EXIST

The previous agent recommended using the existing `/invites/send` route and adding billing_pending to the Supabase invites table, but the ticket was not updated with this clarification.
